Submodules¶

app.main module¶

async app.main.complete_google_login(login: ~app.schemas.user.Email, db: sessionmaker(class_='Session', bind=Engine(sqlite:///./demo.db), autoflush=False, autocommit=False, expire_on_commit=True) = Depends(get_db))¶

Completes the Google login process by generating an access token for the user.

Receives an email object and a database session, finds the user in the database by their email, and generates an access token based on the user’s username and role.

Parameters:

  • login (Email) – An object containing the user’s email.

  • db (SessionLocal) – The database session, by default obtained through dependency.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the access token and the token type.

Return type:

dict

async app.main.health_check()¶

Checks the health of the service.

This endpoint function is used to perform a liveness check of the web service. Returns a status indicating that the service is functioning properly.

Returns:

A dictionary confirming that the service is operational.

Return type:

dict
